roleset.name: violence in return, getting back at

example.name: weird usage
example.text: In addition to the damages, the suit seeks a court order preventing [the guild]-1 from *trace*-1 punishing or retaliating against Mr. Trudeau.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Even though cooperation from Yemen is at a stand still , U.S. officials tell NBC News they 're making substantial progress in the investigation and are fully confident they 'll eventually gather enough evidence to retaliate against those responble .

example.name: arg 1 and CAU
example.text: President Obama issued a Presidential Policy Directive prohibiting retaliation against them for exposing waste, fraud and abuse.
example.arg: for exposing waste, fraud and abuse.

example.name: arg1- action
example.text: Workers at a Walmart-contracted warehouse in Mira Loma, California, were planning a one-day strike on Thursday in response to ongoing unsafe working conditions and retaliation against their organizing to change those conditions.
example.arg: against their organizing to change those conditions.

example.name: retaliation at
example.text: The workers soon tallied that their retaliation at the excesses was possible only when they were organized and united.

roleset.note: RETALIATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'retaliate' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry conspire-71. (from retaliate.01-v)
RETALIATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, retaliate.01. (from retaliation.01-n)
